mapper.select: SELECT noDay, noHour,count(1) AS id ,sum(deltype) as deltype,sum(addtype) as addtype FROM Share_ths_ai_detail t WHERE t.noHour = #{noHour} AND t.noDay= #{noDay} GROUP by noDay, noHour
SELECT * FROM ( select name, share, code ,sum(1) as num,${noDay} as noDay from Share_ths_ai_detail where noDay >= ${noDay} group by name, share, code ) t ORDER BY num desc
SELECT noDay,noHour FROM Share_ths_ai_detail t1 WHERE id =(SELECT max(id) FROM Share_ths_ai_detail)
